help.title: Template Overview
help.information: Templates are a very powerful feature of XAMS, they help Users adding new accounts with individually saved templates. Most email-addresses or Sites are created with a similar scheme. If you know that this will be the case, then you can create a template in advance to speed up the task of account-creation. It is important that every user (no matter if admin, reseller or customer) has his own template - using templates from other users is impossible.

section.head: Site Templates
section.description: You can create templates for Sites here. Editing and deleting is also possible.

section.head: User Templates
section.description: You can create templates for Users here. Editing and deleting is also possible.
